steps.name: When "I click on 'Add to cart' button of product 'Album'"
And I click on the 'View cart' button
When "I change the quantity of 'Album' to 2"
Then I see that "a green banner shows that cart was updated"

items.statusDetails: AssertionError: The image and OCR text do not show a green banner indicating that the cart was updated. Therefore, the statement is false.
